name: TVTextElementStyle
desc: The style applied to the text inside of an element.

items.name: case none
items.desc: No style is applied to the element.

items.name: case title
items.desc: The title style defaults are applied to the element.

items.name: case subtitle
items.desc: The subtitle style defaults are applied to the element.

items.name: case description
items.desc: The description style defaults are applied to the element.

items.name: case decoration
items.desc: The decoration style defaults are applied to the element.
